violations.message: I'll analyze this code against all 72 violation patterns.FAIL: Line 60: validate_environment is instance method, should be @model_validator classmethod; Line 75-76: Exception → Fabricated Value (raises ValueError instead of returning None/fabricating, but validates wrong - auth_provider can be None on init); Line 90-91: Exception → Fabricated Value (raises ValueError but validates API key wrong - os.environ.get can return None, not caught); Line 108: Exception → Boolean Return (returns bool from refresh_access_token without checking result type); Line 129: Exception → Boolean Return (returns bool from refresh_access_token without checking result type)
